name: Squad Erotica
detailed_description:
Pansexual. Straight, Gay, Lesbian, Trans, Male and female nudity, your pick.

In an alternate universe, humanity is scattered through the planets, battling a force of nature that they are barely keeping up with. You are the commander of the esteemed Squad Erotica, working among the planet to push back the invaders. How did it become this way? What will happen next?

Turned based combat that requires some simple strategies and team building. You can customize the skills of your team. 6 mini-games inspired by action games such as flappy bird and shooting games. Over the top and sexually charged themes that may be sexy, comical, outrageous, or all at once.
